alert.note: Alert for Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 3:52PM EDT until June 20 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 252 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles southeast of Eglin Air Force Base to 15 miles east of Santa Rosa Beach, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Bruce, Port Washington, Bunker, Grayton Beach and Portland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
